articles.title: Nice Hat, Loser - aftermath.site
articles.description: Imagine getting up on stage for a presentation that would have cost in the ballpark of $500,000, all to promote your new video game, and instead of having people talk about it, they are instead talking about: a) Your stupid hat b) How your little speech sound…

articles.title: Summer Game Fest 2025 LIVE: Everything announced during the gaming showcase - Tom's Guide
articles.description: The biggest games event of the year

articles.title: ‘Resident Evil Requiem’ Sets February 2026 Release From Capcom - Variety
articles.description: The ninth installment in the "Resident Evil" video game franchise will be released in 2026.

articles.title: ILL Is A Survival Horror Game Made By People Who Worked On Longlegs, IT, V/H/S/Beyond, And More - Game Informer
articles.description: It's coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

articles.title: Surprise, 'Lies of P' first DLC Overture is out right now on Xbox and PC. No, it's true! - Windows Central
articles.description: The first PC and Xbox shadow drop of the week goes to soulslike Life of P, with its first DLC "Overture."

articles.title: Killer Inn is Square Enix’s new ‘murder mystery action’ game - The Verge
articles.description: Square Enix just announced Killer Inn, a new “murder mystery action” game from developer Tactic Studios. It’s getting a closed beta on PC.
